<!--- Global (project-wide) options for 'knitr' --->


<!--- Set knitr's working directory to the project's home directory --->

```{r KnitrWorkDir, echo=FALSE}

if (!suppressMessages(require(knitr))) install.packages('knitr')

PRJ_HOME <- Sys.getenv("DISS_FLOSS_HOME") # getwd()

opts_knit$set(root.dir = PRJ_HOME) # '~/diss-floss/'
```


```{r KnitrSetupGlobal, cache=FALSE, eval=TRUE, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=TRUE}

opts_knit$set(progress = TRUE, verbose = TRUE)

opts_chunk$set(
  eval = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,
  results='markup',
  include = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  error = TRUE,
  message = TRUE,
  tidy = FALSE,
  comment=NA,
  fig.width = 5,
  fig.height = 5,
  fig.align = 'center',
  out.width = '0.8\\textwidth',
  fig.path = 'figures/',
  cache.path='knitr-cache/'
)

#options(markdown.HTML.stylesheet = "path/to/a/custom/style.css")

#echoChunks <- FALSE
#warningChunks<- FALSE
#options(width = 120)  # so the output is 50% wider than the default
```
